help.basedOnProgress: Based on your current progress, here's what we recommend:
help.personalizedHelpDescription: Get personalized help based on where you are in your journey

quickTips.title: Quick Tips
quickTips.tip1: Start with your most important documents first
quickTips.tip2: Add at least one trusted guardian

uploadDocuments.title: Upload Your First Document
uploadDocuments.description: Learn how to securely upload and organize your important documents

steps.1: Click the 'Upload Document' button in the Organize section
steps.2: Select your document file from your computer
steps.3: Choose the document type and add a descriptive name
steps.4: Set an expiration date if applicable
steps.5: Save the document to your secure vault

addGuardians.title: Add Your First Guardian
addGuardians.description: Set up trusted people who can access your information in emergencies

steps.1: Click 'Add Guardian' in the Secure section
steps.2: Enter your guardian's full name and relationship
steps.5: Send them an invitation to accept their role

listAssets.title: List Your Assets
listAssets.description: Document your properties, accounts, and valuable possessions

steps.1: Click 'Add Item' in the Organize section
steps.2: Choose the asset type (property, vehicle, account, etc.)
steps.3: Enter the asset name and details
steps.5: Save the asset to your inventory

designateBeneficiaries.title: Designate Beneficiaries
designateBeneficiaries.description: Specify who should receive your assets and in what proportions

steps.1: Click 'Add Beneficiary' in the Transfer section

createWill.title: Create Your Will
createWill.description: Generate a basic will document based on your information

steps.5: Download and have it properly witnessed

helpPage.title: Help & Support Center
helpPage.subtitle: We're here for you. Find answers to your questions or contact us directly.

q1.question: Is LegacyGuard secure?
q1.answer: Yes, security is our highest priority. We use end-to-end encryption and a zero-trust architecture, meaning no unauthorized person can access your data, not even us. All data is stored in secure data centers within the European Union in compliance with GDPR.

q2.question: What happens to my data if I cancel my subscription?
q2.answer: After canceling, your data remains securely stored in read-only mode for 90 days. You can reactivate your subscription anytime within this period to regain full access. After 90 days, your data will be securely and permanently deleted from our systems.

q3.question: What is a 'Guardian'?
q3.answer: A Guardian is someone you trust (e.g., a partner, sibling, or legal professional) whom you grant special, limited access to your information for emergencies. They cannot change your data; they can only view it to act on your instructions.

q4.question: What's the difference between the 'Vault' and the 'Manual'?
q4.answer: The Heritage Vault is where you securely store all your important papers and things you own. The Survivor's Manual is a curated selection of the most critical contacts, papers, and instructions from your vault, designed for your trusted helpers to have everything essential in one place.

q5.question: Is a will created in LegacyGuard legally binding?
q5.answer: LegacyGuard helps you prepare and organize all the groundwork and information for your will. However, in most European countries, the digital document does not replace the need for an official, signed (and often notarized) document. We recommend always consulting the final version with a legal professional.
